blocks.text: Drumee is a privacy-first cloud desktop that gives you full control over your data, where it lives, who can access it, and how it is used.
Your workspace is encrypted, local-hostable, and never harvested for ads or AI training. Combined with AI auto-organization, Drumee delivers a clean, private, all-in-one digital workspace.

Modern work is fragmented across dozens of apps: Google Drive, Slack, Zoom, Dropbox, and Notion. Files are unorganized, data is scattered, privacy is compromised, and workers waste hours searching instead of creating.
People don’t organize their drive. Their drive becomes unsearchable. Work slows down.

Drumee is a **privacy-first collaborative and storage app**: an all-in-one workspace that feels like your computer but is accessible anywhere, with built-in messaging, file sharing, calls, and collaboration.

items: **AI-powered auto-organization** that keeps your drive clean without effort
**Natural-language search** that understands intent, not filenames
**A privacy-first architecture** with flexible hosting (cloud or local-hosted)
**AI that never trains on your data unless you explicitly allow it**
**A plugin ecosystem** that adapts to how you work
